TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProcessHostPreloadClient

summary.span: 定义一个接口，在某个类型中实现此接口可以在 IIS 7.0 上运行的 ASP.NET 应用程序中预加载该类型。

span.span: Defines an interface that can be implemented in a type in order to preload the type in an ASP.NET application that is running on IIS 7.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口仅供主要用于将非 HTTP 应用程序的 WCF 应用程序。This interface is intended primarily for use by WCF applications that are non-HTTP applications. ASP.NET 开发人员想要预加载 ASP.NET Web 应用程序应使用 HTTP 请求中的模拟[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]结合`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的方法。ASP.NET developers who want to preload ASP.NET Web applications should use the simulated HTTP requests in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] combined with the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > 类型和其方法仅适用于在运行的应用程序[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Preload(string[] parameters) cil managed

param.name: parameters
param.span: 用于初始化应用程序的数据。
此参数可以为 或空数组。

span.span: This parameter can be or an empty array.

summary.span: 提供预加载应用程序所需的初始化数据。

span.span: Provides initialization data that is required in order to preload the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`parameters`可以是`null`，一个零长度的数组，或者填充的数组。The value of `parameters` can be `null`, a zero-length array, or a populated array. > [!NOTE] > 类型和其方法仅适用于在运行的应用程序[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].
